word_mean: 去睾者，无睾者，阉人：摘除睾丸或外生殖器的男子或男孩，尤指在青春期前去势者，故无男性第二性征发生(此举初为亚洲后及希腊的陋习，受阉者用于管理妇女或充君主内侍)

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English, via Latin from Greek eunoukhos, literally 'bedroom guard', from eunē 'bed' + a second element related to ekhein 'to hold'

entry.def: A eunuch is a man who has had his testicles removed.

means.word_mean: 1. a man who has been castrated and is incapable of reproduction;
